attributes.action: ensure the reinstatement of Nurse Margaret Haywood
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Nurse Margaret Haywood, at the Royal Sussex Hospital could not stand the way elderly patients were mistreated. She complained to management but nothing happened. So she helped the BBC expose the malpractice. This has led to a national campaign to help elderly and defenceless patients.

For her public service, she has been struck off the register. 

As surely as she has done a necessary and proper thing, the council that struck her off has harmed patient care.  She must be reinstated and the council reformed to ensure tha it does its job properly.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
